thread.title: Excellent Hotel - handy for business centre
thread.title_full: Excellent Hotel - handy for business centre - Review of Hilton London Angel Islington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Rak G
title: Excellent Hotel - handy for business centre
text: Stayed for a few days due to a conference at the business centre. Its literally next door. Service was excellent - welcoming and helpful. The breakfast is buffet and very good. its a 10 min work to the tube. There are plenty of restuarantsnearby and everything is convienient. Enjoyed the stay there - great staff
